    • setFrameTimeMax

      public static void setFrameTimeMax(double frameTimeMax)
      If delta-time is greater than this value, it will be reset to 0 so physics and input don't break. This is a protection set in place for when the window is moved or resized.
      Parameters:
      frameTimeMax - The maximum delta time allowed. For V-Sync 60fps I would recommend 0.05 at most or 0.02.
